scripts-descriptions.phpins: Runs nunomaduro's PHPInsights. This gives you a report about the current code quality.
scripts-descriptions.phpmd: Runs PHPMD based on original configuration.  You can find the new mess detector report at http://localhost/vendor/prequel/phpmd.html Note that 'Avoid using static access to class' errors should be ignored.
scripts-descriptions.test: Runs the default PHPUnit test suite configured in phpunit.xml
